div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2304 Constantine (anc. Cirta), 300 km. E of Algiers, Algeria, c. 1914 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 611 AE, 1400 PL Numidia (Massinissa and successors): 611 AE (of which nearly half ctmk.) 1400 PL (of which 3 ctmk.) Disposition: G. Thomas Thomas, RN 1949, pp. 114-9, illus. Mazard, CNNM, p. 27
